options.name: URL Pivot Search 1
options.description: Search you want to perform.  Replace the URL below with the search that users can run. The string `{{ENTITY}}` will be replace by the looked up indicator.  You can also use a specific entity type such as `{{IPv4}}`, `{{hash}}`, or `{{cve}}`. You can "or" together multiple entity types with a "|" (e.g., `{{IP|domain}}`. Name> is the name of the search that will be occuring, please ensure the name of the search ends with ">"

options.description: Add an optional description to display for URL Pivot Search 1
